name: ReVerb (Boats, John  Sinderman)
description:
A world filled with various shades of grey and with an audio cannon at your side, overcome physics-based puzzles using soundwaves and experimentation.

ReVerb was created in 3 days for Global Game Jam 2017. The theme was "waves" which we implemented using a sound gun which shot projectiles that produced soundwaves that created different effects.

--CONTROLS--

WASD - MOVEMENT

MOUSE - AIM

SPACE - JUMP

LMB - FIRE AUDIO CANNON
